Errors.message: The > operator is not allowed in a update operation, only equality operators ('==' and 'in') are allowed
Errors.short_message: only equality operators are allowed in get and update operations

Errors.message: Operation updateName must either take a unique field as input or filter on a unique field using a @where attribute
Errors.short_message: updateName does not specify a unique field to lookup by
Errors.hint: Did you mean to add 'id' as an input?
